name: A Little Girl Has All Your Money
Tag, Bag & Fast Advance v1.5
description:
This is still theoretical so any ideas are welcome the idea is as the name implies a tag & bag deck that can also fast advance.

Id like to put biotic labor in the deck but i am unsure weather the econ will work if i make room for it.

name: Dec@Day.01 - Fix It in Beta
description:
Dec@Day - Every identity, one day and deck at a time. It's like NaNoWriMo for Netrunner! More info in my profile.

Haas-Bioroid: Engineering the Future starts as a strong economic Identity, with a suite of 3/2 and 4/2 Agendas to match. On average, an Accelerated Beta Test will net one free ICE, and Project Vitruvius, Jackson Howard, and Interns help make sure any Assets or Upgrades that were trashed can be retrieved.

Early-game is focused on securing centrals and getting an Adonis Campaign or Melange Mining Corp. remote. Once the Runner shuts it down, we can transition into scoring our Agendas. Ash 2X3ZB9CY and Corporate Troubleshooter are for the late-game, where we can mess up the Runner math on runs.

ICE runs from program trashing (Ichi 1.0, Rototurret) to taxing (Eli 1.0, Tollbooth) to just plain annoying (Caduceus, Heimdall 2.0), giving flexibility in choosing how to ruin the Runner's day.

Suggestions, critiques or comments? Feel free--the entire reason I'm doing this is to build my deckbuilding skills--and stop by tomorrow for Noise: Hacker Extraordinaire's turn.

name: May-Day
description:
This deck largely about getting Oracle May down and naming Event (almost) every time for a repeatable $2 and card.

This is based on Corwin Brindley's tournament winning deck list. However that list was 2 cards short so I added 1 Infiltration (useful for money or scouting) and Levy AR Lab Access (in case we deck ourselves) to fill it out. I haven't done much play testing so it probably still needs some tuning. For example, I think one Kati Jones, would be very good for the economy though it would dilute the concentration of events.

Suggestions are appreciated.

name: No Hedge Funds
description: Play giraffes and restructures, recur them and play them again. Defend only centrals. Biotic 4 times(or more to score napd) to win.

name: Braindamaged Kit (2nd in Stimhack League regular season)
description:
Hello!

I decided to share my Kit deck that I have been using with some success in both online and offline tournaments. To be honest, this decklist has not changed for more than 3 months already and I consider it to be a final version of my creation. However, I do hope that you will provide some valuable suggestions, especially that you will have a fresh perspective.

The deck performs extremely well against practically all decks other than NBN fast advance, but I still think that it is able to stand it's ground against NEH and achieve a respectable win rate of around 50%.

The deck excels at threatening all servers. Most of the time, the outermost piece of ice on every server will be irrelevant, as will be all the code gates. From my experience, I quite rarely actually pay for breaking ice, Parasite will be able to take care of most of the problematic non-code gates, especially considering that you will have easy access to Datasucker tokens in most games. I tend to think about it as a control deck. Making sure that Corp cannot score, is crucial, if you can do that, you will eventually find the agendas either in HQ or in R&D. Your late game is stronger that that of practically any Corp and you should be giving them a really hard time protecting servers from free runs.

I do not to want to elaborate on the strategy too much. A lot of this comes with practice and experience. This is by no means an easy deck to play, there are a lot of judgement calls involved. Having played around 200 games with it's different versions I am still very often unsure about some of my decisions.

I encourage you to try the deck, I consider it to be extremely fun to play. I will be happy to hear your thoughts, comments and suggestions and will try to answer all the questions that might come up.

Enjoy!

name: Side tournament @ Polish Nationals 2014 31.08.2014
description: 3rd place. 3/4 wins. 0 agendas scored throughout the tournament :)

name: Blue Sun Pub Scrub
description:
Harness the power of the Sun to remove bad publicity, day or night! This deck is built primarily around rezzing Elizabeth Mills, clearing a bad pub with her, and taking her back into your hand. Her ability activates every time she rezzes, so this deck takes advantage of Illicit ice and the money/bad pub agendas like Hostile Takeover and Geothermal Fracking.

I haven't been able to test this deck yet, but I envision Snare being useful in remotes that have previously seen a lot of EMills spams - runner gets tired of you removing your bad pub, dives in to what he thinks is Elizabeth and faceplants a Snare.

I tried to make Grail Ice work in this as well, but the influence just wasn't available, and I'd much rather make the runner fear the Snare and the tags. Feedback is always welcome!

name: AstroZombie (Italian Regional 1st place)
description:
I called this deck AstroZombie because it obviusly runs 3 AstroScript Pilot Program and it can be fast and violent like a "28 Days later" infect; however I often win with the resilience and the perseverance of a classic Romero's living dead, even with a serious disadvantage in agenda points.

Misfits song is cool too.

name: Smooth Criminal
description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h_D3VFfhvs4

Cuz hes a smooth criminal.

I want to threaten two servers, everyone expects keyhole with Iain I want them to have to ice two centrals to create a really effective lock on HQ and RD.

pretty basic, no central only breakers because they restrict where I can run. I want the corp to have no good places for agendas.

name: Not so original Andromeda (Italian Regional 1st place)
[TBB] The Big Bad v0.1
description:
This is a deck built around taking all the bad publicity from ice like Shinobi and Grim and from the agendas and use taxing ice like Viper (very underrated and underused in my opinion but hey, I'm a newbie, maybe I'm wrong) and Caduceus to take away the benefit of bad publicity from the runner.

Edit: Considering fitting in Posted Bounty as another way to tag the runner and Hive.
